titleStmt.title: The Declaration of Colonel Rich's regiment, with the engagement they have entered into also Major Braman's letter to Lieutenant Colonel Lagoe upon their going into Portsmouth : to which is added another letter sent from Major Braman to a friend of his in London.
titleStmt.author: Braman, John.
Rich, Nathaniel, d. 1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.M. for Livewell Chapman ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
